greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle, read by rows, where the n-th row lists the (2n+1) coefficients of (1+x-x^2)^n.
link: Paul D. Hanna, Rows n=0..34 of triangle, flattened
formula: G.f.: G(0)/2 , where G(k)= 1 + 1/( 1 - (1+x-x^2)*x^(2*k+1)/((1+x-x^2)*x^(2*k+1) + 1/G(k+1) )); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Jul 06 2013
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jun 01 2003
